projects.title: Canal Hispanidad
projects.description: Canal Hispanidad is a platform dedicated to the purchase and rental of documentaries and films produced by Lopez-Li Film. The project was developed using React, taking advantage of its reusable component system to ensure a smooth user experience. Additionally, technologies like VideoJs were implemented for video playback, Stripe for payment processing, and MedusaJs as a backend solution to manage products and payments. The platform is optimized to provide intuitive navigation and a fast purchasing process.

projects.title: Movistar Argentina
projects.description: For Movistar Argentina, I created a website aimed at capturing leads and generating sales for internet and mobile services. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop a design optimized for conversion. The forms are easy to complete, and the experience is designed so that users can quickly find what they're looking for.

projects.title: Mapa de Aguas
projects.description: Mapa de Aguas is an informational site created for Javier Domínguez Angulo, a writer and landscape designer. The site consists of several pages where users can learn about his career, explore his projects, and access information about his philosophy and work. The site is developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a contact form implemented in PHP to facilitate direct communication.

projects.title: Claro Costa Rica
projects.description: In this project for Claro Costa Rica, I developed a website focused on selling mobile plans and internet services. Through various pages, users can compare available options, get details about the plans, and submit their data through forms. The site was built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, with a clean design that facilitates navigation and conversion of users into leads.

projects.title: Movistar Chile
projects.description: The website for Movistar Chile is designed to capture leads and promote the sale of mobile plans and home services. The site includes several pages with plan comparisons, registration forms, and clear calls to action to facilitate conversion. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop a fast and functional site, offering a clear and accessible interface on both mobile devices and desktops.

projects.title: Wow Perú
projects.description: The website for Wow Perú is aimed at capturing leads for mobile plans and internet services. Users can explore the available plans and submit their data through forms. I used HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to develop a site that makes navigation and data submission easy.

about.title: About Me
about.tagline: I am a frontend developer with a passion for interface design and user experience (UX/UI). With a solid foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and experience in React JS, I consider myself detail-oriented, creative, and with a strong ability to communicate with interdisciplinary teams.

experiences.title: Frontend Developer
details: Development of a streaming and movie purchase/rental website for Lopez-Li Films using ReactJs with Vite, Redux, and React-Router-Dom.
Integration with the MedusaJs API for ecommerce and integration with the Stripe API for payments.
Use of VideoJs for movie playback.
Handling of Axios for API Requests and Jwt-Decode.
Handling of EsLint in VSCode for debug.
